replies.body:
Tell me:
What mod do you use to create those blood effects when you hit someone?
What's the song name?
Why does motion blur look so smooth *o*

replies.body:
Can u link Sony vegas pro 12 for download/Buy.. cause as i said 13 for some reason doesnt render my vids. Thanks! :D Looks like i need to buy After effects.. Vegas costs 600$. No way my dad will buy that... well he would buy After effects for 500$ x3

@Cinnamoncroc 

Song: Electro lights- Fall for gravity [NCS Release]
Motion blur: when you finish up your project and when ready to render.. Pick what motion blur you want :)
